name: Furnace Wavetable
summary: An FUW file is a wavetable used by tildearrow Furnace, a multiplatform chiptune tracker. It contains information about a wavetable (a more complex variation of synthesis for creating more unique sounds) in the Furnace Wavetable (FUW) format. FUW files include values that make up the wavetable and metadata , such as the creation date and FUW format version.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
